title: Paint Shooter
description: An arcade-style shooting game with the central mechanic of combining primary colors.
technologyString: HTML, Canvas, & JavaScript. Music composed in Garage Band

title: HotSpot
description: A web app where users can check into places they visit, then share locations anonymously or personally.
technologyString: JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and Google Maps API

title: IronQuest
description: A full-stack MERN choose-your-own adventure where users can create their own stories based off of previous entries.
technologyString: JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, & Heroku

title: Rainbow Day
description: This code pen will tell you what day it is, and will highlight in rainbow before returning to black.

title: Canvas Bubbles
description: A moving bubble generator using HTML Canvas. Each bubble is randomized, and expands near the mouse.
